overview: Previously, he was Senior Vice President Strategic Business Development for Baltimore Technologies (London:BLM). As a senior manager David had responsibility for formulating industry vertical sales strategy, revenue growth within these verticals and forming strategic partnerships with key organizations. During this period Baltimore grew revenue form $1.5m in 1997 to over $100m in 2001. David also helped establish Baltimore’s presence in the North American and APAC Regions. Prior to his role in Baltimore Technologies, David held various roles in information security within the financial services sector in Ireland. He is a frequent speaker on internet security topics, e-business and e-government. David holds a degree in Financial Information Systems from Trinity College Dublin, Ireland.
